title: Launching NetSky AI
text:
Today marks the launch of NetSky AI, a groundbreaking tool designed to transform email for non-technical users, putting the power of AI into your inbox to handle routine tasks with ease and precision. Whether it’s parsing spreadsheet data, coordinating calendar schedules across multiple users, or sending automated daily updates, NetSky AI offers an intuitive, hands-free approach to managing essential daily workflows or expeditiously handling one-off tasks you wish you could pass to an assistant.
We’ve all heard that AI will democratize the power of code for a new generation of workers, but with NetSky, the email inbox that you use every day becomes a development environment. Even your grandma can execute code to solve problems at work.

title: Launching NetSky AI
text:
Why NetSky AI?
More than anything, NetSky is your boss’s personal assistant, at less than a fraction of the cost.

Trying to find a meeting slot that works across 10 busy people’s schedules? NetSky can get permission to shuffle the entire team’s schedules to best align to their highest priority tasks.
Not sure what you should be doing? NetSky can read your emails to remind you of everything that you should be doing, and give some helpful steps to accomplish them!
Need a one-off report explaining what happened in your competition’s earnings call yesterday? That took your analyst all day, but NetSky can have that to you in 5 minutes.

As a manager, why pay for one personal assistant when your entire team can have one for even less money?
NetSky AI is specifically crafted for non-technical users looking to get more from their email, without learning complex software. By embedding AI into day-to-day processes, NetSky helps users unlock efficiency in managing all sorts of tasks. Here’s what makes NetSky AI different:

Spreadsheet Parsing: Simply attach a spreadsheet, and NetSky AI will parse, analyze, and summarize data directly in your inbox, eliminating manual data handling.
User Email Context: NetSky builds a database of your unique work, meaning that it will give you answers that are specified for your needs without endless ChatGPT prompting. Better yet, this is all stored while considering our industry leading privacy policy!
Automated Scheduling and Calendar Coordination: When requested, NetSky can even negotiate across users, ensuring meetings are scheduled effortlessly, and your entire organization’s context is considered for optimal business outcomes.
Daily Updates Delivered to Your Inbox: Configure NetSky to send end-of-day summaries or project status updates, keeping teams aligned without additional work. That daily newsletter your intern wrote is now 100% accurate and timely thanks to the consistency of code.
Code Execution for Non-Programmers: Need to know what every website in the world is saying about your company? NetSky can execute a sentiment analysis. Tooling that was previously reserved for the tech savvy is now available to anyone that can write an email.

As we launch, NetSky AI is committed to ongoing development that incorporates user feedback and expands on these core features, continually refining our approach to serve your productivity needs.

title: Launching NetSky AI
text:
What’s next?
At NetSky, we’re not only developing a smarter email assistant but building a partner in productivity. Join us on this journey as we unlock new AI-powered capabilities that empower every user to manage their time, communications, and tasks more efficiently.
Welcome to the future of email with NetSky AI. We’re excited to share it with you!

Launching NetSky AI

title: About us
text:
NetSky AI was founded in October of 2024 with a singular vision: to make email an effortlessly productive experience for everyone. In a world overflowing with information and tasks, we believe your inbox should help—not hinder—your workflow. With NetSky AI, we’re building an intuitive AI assistant that tackles the mundane, repetitive tasks, freeing up your time for what truly matters.



NetSky AI began as a shared vision between two Rice University classmates, Cody and Dylan, who reconnected years after their undergraduate days. By 2023, both were deeply involved in the world of large language models (LLMs). Dylan was leading compute resources and financial strategy for Amazon’s AGI division, while Cody was at Voltron Data, creating tools to help users harness the power of LLMs with their data, and previously in Microsoft’s Azure AI division, empowering developers to reach the future of AI through their MLOps journey.
As they exchanged stories from their careers, Cody and Dylan recognized a gap in how AI was applied to everyday productivity tools, especially for non-technical users. Many advanced AI capabilities remained locked behind complex interfaces, out of reach for people who could benefit the most from them. Fueled by this insight and their shared entrepreneurial spark, Cody and Dylan created NetSky AI—a straightforward, powerful AI email assistant that enables users to get the most out of their inbox with minimal effort.



NetSky AI brings powerful automation into your inbox. Our features empower users to:

Parse and Summarize Data: Attach a spreadsheet, and NetSky AI will process and summarize the information directly in your email.
Negotiate and Schedule Meetings: Our AI coordinates calendars across users, streamlining meeting setups and freeing you from back-and-forth emails.
Automate Updates: Configure NetSky AI to deliver daily or project-specific updates, keeping teams aligned effortlessly.




Cody and Dylan bring complementary backgrounds and a passion for pushing the boundaries of technology. Dylan spent the last few years at Amazon’s AGI division, managing compute resources and financial strategy, before deciding to pursue entrepreneurial ventures that put his ideas into action. Cody, with his technical expertise from Voltron Data, dbt Labs, and Microsoft’s Azure AI organization, has been at the forefront of creating accessible AI tools for data professionals. Together, they aim to make the best of AI accessible to everyone, right from your inbox.
Find Dylan or Cody on LinkedIn



We’re committed to evolving NetSky AI based on real feedback from users. This is just the beginning—we’re constantly working on new ways to enhance productivity and make AI an indispensable ally in your daily life.
Join us as we redefine what your email can do. Welcome to the future of productivity with NetSky AI.
Contact the founders for more information.
